scripts.postinstall: yarn prebuild && yarn pod-install && yarn reset-gitignore
scripts.android-local-aab: rm -rf build && rm -rf android/build && cd android && ./gradlew clean && ./gradlew bundleRelease && cd ..
scripts.ios-local-dev-debug: yarn env:dev && yarn prebuild && yarn ios-local-debug
scripts.ios-local-stg-debug: yarn env:staging && yarn prebuild && yarn ios-local-debug
scripts.ios-local-prd-debug: yarn env:production && yarn prebuild && yarn ios-local-debug
scripts.ios-local-dev-release: yarn env:dev && yarn prebuild && yarn ios-local-release
scripts.ios-local-stg-release: yarn env:staging && yarn prebuild && yarn ios-local-release
scripts.ios-local-prd-release: yarn env:production && yarn prebuild && yarn ios-local-release
scripts.ios-remote-dev-release: yarn env:dev && eas build -p ios --profile develop
scripts.ios-remote-stg-release: yarn env:staging && eas build -p ios --profile staging
scripts.android-local-dev-debug: yarn env:dev && yarn prebuild && yarn android-local-debug
scripts.android-local-stg-debug: yarn env:staging && yarn prebuild && yarn android-local-debug
scripts.android-local-prod-debug: yarn env:production && yarn prebuild && yarn android-local-debug
scripts.android-local-dev-release: yarn env:dev && yarn prebuild && yarn android-local-release
scripts.android-local-stg-release: yarn env:staging && yarn prebuild && yarn android-local-release
scripts.android-local-prod-release: yarn env:production && yarn prebuild && yarn android-local-release
